00018 class ProjCoord
00019 {
00020 protected:
00021      double mX;   
00022      double mY;   
00023 
00024 public:
00026      inline ProjCoord(double x, double y) : mX(x), mY(y) {}
00027      inline virtual ~ProjCoord() {}
00028 
00030      inline void set(double inx, double iny) { mX = inx; mY = iny; }
00032      inline double x() const { return mX; }
00034      inline double y() const { return mY; }
00036      inline double squDistanceTo(const ProjCoord &p) const;
00037 
00039      LatLng toLatLng() const;
00040      
00041      // Friends
00043      friend std::ostream &operator << (std::ostream &o, const ProjCoord &p);
00044 };
00045 
00046 inline double ProjCoord::squDistanceTo(const ProjCoord &p) const {
00047      double dx = (mX - p.mX) * cos(mY * kDeg2Rad );
00048      double dy = (mY - p.mY);
00049      return ((dx * dx) + (dy * dy)) * kMetersPerDegreeLat2;
00050 }
